item.title: LeetCode 342. Power of Four 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 檢查 $n$ 是否為 4 的次方。Check $n$ whether it is a power of four or not.

item.title: LeetCode 24. Swap Nodes in Pairs 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 將兩兩相鄰的 node 交換順序。Swap every two adjacent nodes.

item.title: LeetCode 326. Power of Three 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 檢查 $n$ 是否為 3 的次方。Check $n$ whether it is a power of three or not.

item.title: LeetCode 2. Add Two Numbers 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 兩組以 Linked List 方式儲存的數字進行加總。Add the two numbers and return the sum as a linked list.

item.title: LeetCode 21. Merge Two Sorted Lists 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 把兩個已經排序的 Linked List 結合在一起。Merge the two lists in a one sorted list.
